text: Rafael de Faria Cortez (born October 25, 1976 in São Paulo, Brazil) is a Brazilian journalist, actor and comedian. He graduated in journalism from PUC- SP and since 2008 is a reporter the TV Show Custe o Que Custar. == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:Actors from São Paulo Category:Brazilian comedians Category:Brazilian journalists Category:Living people Category:1976 births
title: Rafael Cortez
